unnormalised: Choosing a payment gateway is tougher than convincing my bua in Delhi to try biryani without onions! It's like navigating a Mumbai local during rush hour. Which gateway won't leave you hanging like when the auto driver says "Rs. 20 extra, madam"? Seriously, the struggle is real. Happy Onam, may your transactions be as smooth as appam batter!
normalised: Choosing a payment gateway is tougher than convincing my bua in Delhi to try biryani without onions! It's like navigating a Mumbai local during rush hour. Which gateway won't leave you hanging like when the auto driver says "rupees twenty extra, madam"? Seriously, the struggle is real. Happy Onam, may your transactions be as smooth as appam batter!
